## Source: ossf-package-analysis (febb0ae91d31731d573a6aa77d05686bcf7419fc07fc038f24b5e1b55aec6644)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'adandv' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
